aekiro_checkbox.name: Checkbox
aekiro_checkbox.description: Makes a sprite object behave like a checkbox.

normal-frames.name: Normal Frames
normal-frames.desc: Frame and/or animation when in normal state. eg: frameNumberUnchecked,frameNumberChecked

hover-frames.name: Hover Frames
hover-frames.desc: Frame and/or animation when hovered by the cursor. eg: frameNumberUnchecked,frameNumberChecked

disabled-frames.name: Disabled Frames
disabled-frames.desc: Frame and/or animation when disabled. eg: frameNumberUnchecked,frameNumberChecked

focus-frame.name: Focus Frame
focus-frame.desc: Frame and/or animation when focused. eg: animationName/frameNumber

normal-color.name: Normal color
normal-color.desc: Color when in normal state, in the format: colorChecked;colorUnChecked

hover-color.name: Hover color
hover-color.desc: Color when hovered by the cursor, in the format: colorChecked;colorUnChecked

clicked-color.name: Clicked color
clicked-color.desc: Color when clicked, in the format: colorChecked;colorUnChecked

disabled-color.name: Disabled Color
disabled-color.desc: Color when disabled, in the format: colorChecked;colorUnChecked

click-sound.name: Click Sound
click-sound.desc: Sound to play when clicked. eg: soundName/volume

focus-sound.name: Focus Sound
focus-sound.desc: Sound to play when focused. eg: soundName/volume

hover-sound.name: Hover Sound
hover-sound.desc: Sound to play on mouse enter.

hover-animation.name: Hover Animation
hover-animation.desc: Animation to play on mouse enter.

onmouseenter0.description: Triggered when the mouse cursor enter the checkbox.

onmouseleave1.description: Triggered when the mouse cursor leave the checkbox.

isenabled2.description: True if the checkbox is currently enabled.

onclicked3.description: Triggered when the checkbox is clicked.

ischecked4.description: True if the checkbox is currently checked.

onfocused.description: Triggered when the button is focused.

onunfocused.description: Triggered when the button is unfocused.

isfocused.description: True if the button is currently focused.

isclickable.description: True if the checkbox is clickable.

setignoreinput.description: Set the Ignore Input property of the button.

state.name: State
state.desc: The state of the Ignore Input.

setvalue1.description: Set the value of the checkbox.

value2.name: value
value2.desc: The new value of the checkbox

setvalue0.description: Set the value of the checkbox.

value0.name: value
value0.desc: The new value of the checkbox

state.name: State
state.desc: The focus state of the button.

value0.description: Get the value of the checkbox.
